editName.title: Name
editName.desc: Your first and last given names. Updates are reflected across all Zillow experiences.

editScreenName.title: Screen name
editScreenName.desc: Prefer to remain anonymous when writing reviews? Choose a unique screen name instead.

editPhoto.title: Photo
editPhoto.desc: Personalize your profile pic with a custom photo.

review.title: Reviews
review.desc: Manage the reviews youâ€™ve written for professionals, rentals, and more.

editEmail.title: Email
editEmail.desc: The email address associated with your account.

editPassword.title: Password
editPassword.desc: Set a unique password to protect your account.
editPassword.currentPasswordHint: Password currently associated with your account
editPassword.passwordRule4: Mix of uppercase and lowercase letters

fa.title: 2-Step Verification
fa.desc: Make your account extra secure. Along with your password, you'll need to enter a code that we text to your phone each time you sign in.
fa.formDesc: Enter the phone number you want to use for two-step verification. {{tag}} SMS fees may apply

ggSignIn.title: Google sign in
ggSignIn.desc: You've linked your Google account to Zillow and are using it to sign in. You are signed in as {{email}}.
ggSignIn.formDesc: Are you sure you want to unlink this account?

deactivate.title: Deactivate my account
deactivate.desc: This will shut down your account, but retain your information. You won't be able to sign in again until your account is reactivated.

privacy.title: Privacy & Cookies
privacy.desc: Tools that allow you to see and manage your personal data.
